# Task Issue Template

**Location:** `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/task.md`  
**Purpose:** Enforce team and lead declaration for all execution tasks  
**Effective Date:** February 1, 2026

---

```markdown
---
name: Execution Task
about: Create a task for execution agents to complete under Lead Agent supervision
title: "[TASK] "
labels: ['task', 'execution']
---

## Task Metadata

**Task ID:** [Auto-generated by GitHub]  
**Team:** [Select from dropdown]  
**Lead Agent:** [Name of Lead Agent from registry]  
**Execution Agent:** [To be assigned]  
**Status:** Open

- **Team:** [Team Name]

[Clear description of the task]

### Out of Scope

### Execution Agent Declaration

The execution agent **must declare**:

- [ ] I understand the task scope
- [ ] I understand I am working under Lead Agent: [Name]
- [ ] I understand my authority is limited to: [Scope]
- [ ] I will not approve my own work
- [ ] I will escalate blockers to the Lead Agent
- [ ] I will document all decisions in GitHub

## Governance Compliance

This task complies with:

- [ ] Model D + Model E operational model
- [ ] Lead Agent decision authority
- [ ] Execution agent scope limits
- [ ] GitHub as source of truth
- [ ] No out-of-band context
- [ ] Full auditability

---

## Labels

Use these labels to track task status:

- `task` — This is a task
- `execution` — Execution task (not decision/review)
- `team:chief-of-staff` — Assigned to Chief of Staff team
- `team:execution-coordination` — Assigned to Execution Coordinator team
- `team:quality-assurance` — Assigned to Quality Assurance team
- `team:security` — Assigned to Security team
- `team:documentation` — Assigned to Documentation team
- `status:open` — Task is open
- `status:in-progress` — Task is in progress
- `status:blocked` — Task is blocked
- `status:review` — Task is in Lead Agent review
- `status:complete` — Task is complete

---

## Questions?

If you have questions about this task:

1. Review the task scope above
2. Check the Lead Agent mandate
3. Review related issues for context
4. Escalate to Lead Agent if still unclear

Do NOT assume context outside of GitHub artifacts.

---

**Template Version:** 1.0  
**Effective Date:** February 1, 2026  
**Maintained By:** Chief of Staff (Manus Agent)
```
